navigation.translation[0].definitions[0]: the science or job of planning which way you need to go when you are travelling from one place to another
compasses and other instruments of navigation
navigation.translation[0].definitions[1]: when someone sails a ship along a river or other area of water
Navigation becomes more difficult further up the river.
navigation.translation[0].definitions[2]: when you click on words, pictures etc in order to move between documents that are connected on the Internet
